sys_remote_update_set.description:
Ideas on how we can get the teams to actually deliver the proper service?
I am thinking for the firewall request specifically, we add an approval stage back to the requestor identifying the change has been implemented and requires there approval of the service?
This should be global for all non-generic requests.
Thoughts?
Ian V. Spitzer, ITIL | Service Transition Manager Verisk Analytics - Information Technology
Phone: +1.201.469.3628 | Mobile: +1.201.850.7176 | Fax: +1.201.469.4147
Verisk Analytics
Forbes 2016 Most Innovative CompaniesForbes 2016 Best Large Employers
verisk.com | Join Our Talent Network | vCard | Map | Email
BlogLinkedInTwitterRSS Feed
To access Service-Now request portal: https://verisk.service-now.com/sd/ To access user guides: Useful Documents
From: Bader, Scott Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 3:06 PM To: Bhojwani, Sheila A; Currence, Brad; Negrete, Jeffrey Cc: Moon, Chuck; Heneghan, Daniel; Spitzer, Ian Subject: RE: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed
Sorry for the delay Sheila
I spoke with Gerald and his comments are below. Adding Ian. The service now team will jump in and make sure we address this.
Scott, I just spoke to David over the phone and helped him understand where the process broke down. I would like to speak to you and get your input on ideas to fix the workflow if you have some time.
--gerald
Thanks Scott
Scott Bader | Head of System Support Services Verisk Analytics - Information Technology Phone: +1.201.469.3235 | Mobile: +1.917.734.2464 Verisk Analytics Forbes 2016 Most Innovative CompaniesForbes 2016 Best Large Employers verisk.com | Join Our Talent Network | vCard | Map | Email BlogLinkedInTwitterRSS Feed
From: Bhojwani, Sheila A Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 2:54 PM To: Bader, Scott; Currence, Brad; Negrete, Jeffrey Cc: Moon, Chuck; Heneghan, Daniel Subject: RE: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed
Brad, It is getting late in the day, and I need to get back with David. Do you want me to have him reach out to Scott?
From: Bader, Scott Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 11:12 AM To: Currence, Brad <BCurrence@verisk.com>; Negrete, Jeffrey <Jeff.Negrete@verisk.com> Cc: Bhojwani, Sheila A <sabhojwani@xactware.com>; Moon, Chuck <cemoon@verisk.com>; Heneghan, Daniel <DHeneghan@verisk.com> Subject: RE: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed
This is not the first time I have seen that the tickets are being closed complete but yet the customers are NOT getting what is needed.
I can look into what happened on this one. Let me get back to this chain with my findings.
Thanks Scott
Scott Bader | Head of System Support Services Verisk Analytics - Information Technology Phone: +1.201.469.3235 | Mobile: +1.917.734.2464 Verisk Analytics Forbes 2016 Most Innovative CompaniesForbes 2016 Best Large Employers verisk.com | Join Our Talent Network | vCard | Map | Email BlogLinkedInTwitterRSS Feed
From: Currence, Brad Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 11:57 AM To: Negrete, Jeffrey; Bader, Scott Cc: Bhojwani, Sheila A; Moon, Chuck; Heneghan, Daniel Subject: RE: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed
Jeff / Scott, Who would be the one to look into this? We have a frustrated customer here, and if the story below is accurate, I can empathize.
Help?
From: Bhojwani, Sheila A Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 9:38 AM To: Currence, Brad Subject: FW: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed Importance: High
How do you want to handle this? David wants to follow up with someone in IS&T on this. I can send it to Chuck if you like.
From: Luse, David Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 8:01 AM To: Bhojwani, Sheila A <sabhojwani@xactware.com>; Evans, Jim <jtevans@xactware.com> Subject: FW: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed Importance: High
Sheila
Please see the ticket below, unfortunately it is not actually completed, I still do not have access to Oracle on prod. I hate to bother you with this as I know you are very busy, but I have been trying for 3 weeks to just get access to the Oracle apps on prod, and I have gotten nowhere. I suspect this is more a measure of my not being able to navigate the system as anything, but this pertains to a very high profile project (the PeopleSoft migration) and my not being able to view invoices in prod is hampering that effort.
I also know this is not protocol and that I should go through the proper channels, but I have not been able to find out what the proper channels are. Dave and Scott have been very helpful, but I do not think they are who I should be talking to for this. If you could guide me in the right direction as to how to solve this task I would be very grateful.
Thank you in advance for your help
David Luse | Director Xactware - Claims Solutions - Product
Phone: +1.801.932.8221 | Mobile: +1.801.380.2413
Xactware
xactware.com | vCard | Map | Email LinkedInTwitterYouTube
From: Verisk Service Management [mailto:verisk@service-now.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2017 6:39 AM To: Luse, David <dluse@xactware.com> Subject: RITM0087455 Stage Changed To Completed
Verisk Service Management
Requested Item Number RITM0087455 Requested Item Firewall Requests Stage Completed Priority 3 - Moderate Opened By David Luse Opened On 01-04-2017 Short Description Firewall Requests
Ref:MSG5155758
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Loop Requestor Validation in Firewall Change workflow
